feed.title: Baseless Bingo
feed.subtitle: Baseless Bingo - All of the bingo, none of the research.

entry.title: The Batman
entry.content: The Batman is a movie about a man made of bats. Like 10 or 20 bats. It’s crazy. Also there is a penguin man and a guy who really likes riddles.
entry.summary: The Batman is a movie about a man made of bats. Like 10 or 20 bats. It’s crazy. Also there is a penguin man and a guy who really likes riddles.

entry.title: Morbius
entry.content: Biochemist Michael Morbius tries to cure himself of a rare blood disease, but he inadvertently infects himself with a form of vampirism instead, living vampirism.
entry.summary: Biochemist Michael Morbius tries to cure himself of a rare blood disease, but he inadvertently infects himself with a form of vampirism instead, living vampirism.

entry.title: Spider-Man No Way Home
entry.content: Spider-Man: No Way Home is an upcoming superhero film, based on the Marvel Comics superhero of the same name. The film is a sequel to Spider-Man: Homecoming and Spider-Man: Far From Home. It is the twenty-seventh film in the Marvel Cinematic Universe and the fourth film of Phase Four
entry.summary: Spider-Man: No Way Home is an upcoming superhero film, based on the Marvel Comics superhero of the same name. The film is a sequel to Spider-Man: Homecoming and Spider-Man: Far From Home. It is the twenty-seventh film in the Marvel Cinematic Universe and the fourth film of Phase Four

entry.title: Shang Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings

link.title: Shang Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings

entry.content: Shang-Chi, the master of unarmed weaponry based Kung Fu, is forced to confront his past after being drawn into the Ten Rings organisation.
entry.summary: Shang-Chi, the master of unarmed weaponry based Kung Fu, is forced to confront his past after being drawn into the Ten Rings organisation.

entry.title: What If?
entry.content: Exploring pivotal moments from the Marvel Cinematic Universe and turning them on their head, leading the audience into uncharted territory.
entry.summary: Exploring pivotal moments from the Marvel Cinematic Universe and turning them on their head, leading the audience into uncharted territory.

entry.title: The Suicide Squad
entry.content: Suicide is not usually a group activity but in James Gunn’s the Suicide Squad it is. Supervillains Harley Quinn, Bloodsport, Peacemaker and a collection of nutty cons at Belle Reve prison join the super-secret, super-shady Task Force X as they are dropped off at the remote, enemy-infused island of Corto Maltese.
entry.summary: Suicide is not usually a group activity but in James Gunn’s the Suicide Squad it is. Supervillains Harley Quinn, Bloodsport, Peacemaker and a collection of nutty cons at Belle Reve prison join the super-secret, super-shady Task Force X as they are dropped off at the remote, enemy-infused island of Corto Maltese.
